short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a tooltip '?' beside known initials for easier reading

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a '?' beside each known initial/acronym in /r/ticktockmanitowoc. By mousing over the '?', you can view the expanded name and description.

Expanded information is source from:

"Who's Who" document -https://www.dropbox.com/s/hx4powt78k143ny/who%27swho.docx?dl=0

TTM wiki - https://www.reddit.com/r/TickTockManitowoc/wiki/abbreviations


PM /u/paenulas for bug reports/suggestions/etc.
